div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 22:53 pm CDT

div.div: A slight chance of rain after 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 42. Calm wind. Chance of precipitation is 10%.

A chance of rain, mainly before 1pm. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 63. Light south southwest wind becoming west 8 to 13 mph in the morning. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.
Mostly clear, with a low around 39. West wind 7 to 9 mph becoming north after midnight.
